parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per pharmacokinetic parameter per time-concentration profile per specimen per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.POOLID

datasetVariables.description: Used to identify a set of subjects that contributed to the recorded measurement. Within the PP domain, this represents the subjects that contributed to the PPTEST result.
datasetVariables.label: Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: POOLID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: PPSEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain to support relationships within the domain and between domains. This is not the treatment group number.
datasetVariables.label: Group Identifier
datasetVariables.name: PPGRPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85839

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in PPTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in PPTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). PPTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: AUCINT, TMAX, CMAX.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Short Name
datasetVariables.name: PPTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85493

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for PPTESTCD. The value in PPTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: AUCINT, Time of CMAX Observation, Max Conc.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Name
datasetVariables.name: PPTEST

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of related records. For PP, this should be the name of the analyte in PPTEST whose profile the parameter is associated with.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Category
datasetVariables.name: PPCAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSCAT

datasetVariables.description: Categorization of the model type used to calculate the pharmacokinetic parameters. Examples include COMPARTMENTAL, NON-COMPARTMENTAL.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Subcategory
datasetVariables.name: PPSCAT

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the measurement or finding as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: PPORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85494

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPORRESU

datasetVariables.description: The unit for the original result. The unit of the original result should be mapped to a synonymous unit on the Controlled Terminology list.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Original Result
datasetVariables.name: PPORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings derived from PPORRES in a standard format or standard units. PPSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in PPSTRESN. For example, if a test has results NONE, NEG, and NEGATIVE in PPORRES and these results effectively have the same meaning, they could be represented in standard format in PPSTRESC as NEGATIVE. For other examples, see general assumptions.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: PPSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; contains the numeric form of PPSTRESC. PPSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Numeric Format
datasetVariables.name: PPSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85494

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for PPSTRESC and PPSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Standardized Result
datasetVariables.name: PPSTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that a parameter was not calculated. Should be null if a result exists in PPORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: PPSTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why a parameter was not performed, such as INSUFFICIENT DATA. Used in conjunction with PPSTAT when value is NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: PPREASND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C77529

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSPEC

datasetVariables.description: Defines the type of specimen used for a measurement. If multiple specimen types are used for a calculation (e.g., serum and urine for creatinine clearance), then this field should be left blank. Examples: SERUM, PLASMA, URINE.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Material Type
datasetVariables.name: PPSPEC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: It is the planned study day for the time point reference of the time-concentration profile.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Collection
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPTPTREF

datasetVariables.description: Name of the fixed reference point used as a basis for PPRFTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Time Point Reference
datasetVariables.name: PPTPTREF

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPRFTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of the reference time point from the PC records used to calculate a parameter record. The values in PPRFTDTC should be the same as that in PCRFTDTC for related records.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Reference Point
datasetVariables.name: PPRFTDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPSTINT

datasetVariables.description: Start of an interval relative to Time Point Reference (PPTPTREF) in ISO 8601 duration format. Example: when the area under the curve is calculated from 12 to 24 hours (PPTESTCD=AUCT1T2), the value would be PT12H.
datasetVariables.label: Start of Evaluation Interval
datasetVariables.name: PPSTINT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable PP.PPENINT

datasetVariables.description: End of an interval relative to Time Point Reference (PPTPTREF) in ISO 8601 duration format. Example: when the area under the curve is calculated from 12 to 24 hours (PPTESTCD=AUCT1T2), the value would be PT24H.
datasetVariables.label: End of Evaluation Interval
datasetVariables.name: PPENINT

description: A findings domain that contains pharmacokinetic parameters derived from pharmacokinetic concentration-time (PC) data. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C49607, 2018-06-29)
label: Pharmacokinetics Parameters
name: PP
